    • Method Detail

      • login

        public AcademicStaff login(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                           java.lang.String password)
                    throws DPMSystemException
        Takes an email address and password as inputs and compares them against those contained in staff list. If a match is found, the method returns a reference to the academic staff class instance, at the same time storing this reference for future use.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress -
        password -
        Returns:
        Reference to academic staff class instance.
        Throws:
        DPMSystemException - If no matching email address and password are found.
